name: cypress-fe-be
description: This project aims to automate the web and api using typescript

scripts.delete:reports: if exist "cypress\results" (rmdir /Q /S "cypress\results" && echo Deleted results) else (echo results dir does not exist)
scripts.delete:screenshots: if exist "cypress\screenshots" (rmdir /Q /S "cypress\screenshots" && echo Deleted screenshots) else (echo screenshots dir does not exist)
scripts.pretest: npm run delete:reports && npm run delete:screenshots
scripts.test: npm run cypress:run && npm run merge-reports && npm run generate-html-report

author: B Mahendar Reddy
